items.title: I told my bank to fund a backdoor IRA, but my adviser left the money in the wrong account. Should I sue?
items.description: “The return value of the IRA account increased about 20% that year.”

items.title: Nvidia’s Jensen Huang fears losing the Chinese market. One analyst says that’s short-term thinking.
items.description: While Nvidia could get shut out of China, it has a big opportunity to grow in other international markets over time.

items.title: Egg lovers can’t get a break. Vital Farms to raise prices because of tariffs.
items.description: Citing effects of tariffs, Vital Farms tells retail partners like Kroger, Target and Whole Foods that it will raise egg prices at least 10% this month...

items.title: Burger King parent saw slower start to the year as revenue and earnings miss marks
items.description: Restaurant Brands is the latest fast-food giant to cite weak first-quarter demand.

items.title: Krispy Kreme rethinks McDonald’s partnership, scraps dividend to save cash
items.description: Krispy Kreme’s stock suffering a record plunge after the doughnut seller scraps its dividend, reassesses its McDonald’s arrangement and reports downbe...
